IT IS PROPOSED TO BE DELETED.''" (I am not criticizing the fact that the text is here to prevent user from using this property. I only suggest just a prettier way to present it.) And it's why I create "[[User:Jitrixis/itemNotice.js|itemNotice]]". This script want to add a template on the top, on the bottom or on the side of the item. '''How it's work actually :''' *To add a template, We have to '''add an alias in English''' *##HEAD:template!parameter=value!parameter2=value2!etc *#*To add on the '''top''' of the item *##FOOT:template!parameter=value!parameter2=value2!etc *#*To add on the '''bottom''' of the item *##ASIDE:template!parameter=value!parameter2=value2!etc *#*To add on the '''right''' of the item *##NOTICE:template!parameter=value!parameter2=value2!etc *#*The template determine ''automaticaly'' the position of the template (DEFAULT : ASIDE) *#**To add the default position on a template use: *#**#
itemNotice:HEAD
*#**#
itemNotice:ASIDE
*#**#
itemNotice:FOOT
*What are the default parameter send to a template. **itemNotice send by default {{the template and the paramaters|title=video|item=Property:P10|id=p10|isQuery=false|isProperty=true|location=HEAD}} But I have many question about '''"How do we use this Script ?"''' : == Do you think this script can be usefull ? == Do you think this script can be usefull?
